New Publication: Language Documentation Review

A new book review of mine was published the other week, in Linguist List. Here are the details:

  • Richard Littauer (2013). Review of F. Seifart, G. Haig, N. Himmelmann, D. Jung, A. Margetts, & P. Trilsbeek, eds., Potentials of Language Documentation: Methods, Analyses, and Utilization. In: Language Documentation & Conservation Special Publication No. 3. Online: University of Hawaiâ€™i Press. In: LINGUIST List, 24.2604. URL

It was a fun book to read, and it is also free. I suggest browsing through the LDCJ if you are interested in low resource languages.
